<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twin Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=523) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 175 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57) (Level 12)

**Trigger**
A creature within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

**Requirements**
You are benefiting from [Twin Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=377).

</column>

---

A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon. Make a melee Strike or use a [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) action against the triggering opponent.

<title level="2">Twin Riposte leads to...</title>
[Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=418), [Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=536), [Reflecting Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1247)
name: Twin Riposte
requirement: You are benefiting from  Twin Parry .
